channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [BHS7][Network] - Network equipment operation
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 3, 07:00 - 11:00 UTC

Sep 22, 07:34 UTC
Scheduled - Due to an imponderable we have to postpone the intervention.
We will post a new update to indicate the new maintenance dates

Sep 22, 07:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 8, 00:17 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/09/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 22/09/2022 11:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure, we will upgrade the version of multiple network equipment.

item.title: [RBX7][DedicatedServers] - Rack R710A21/R715B07/R713A01/R710A10
item.description:
Oct 11, 13:40 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 11/10/2022 11:30 UTC
End Time : 11/10/2022 13:35 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 11, 10:48 UTC
Update - 2 more racks are concerned.

Oct 11, 10:07 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/10/2022 11:30 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the R710A21/R715B07 racks could become unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Our initial investigation shows a link with the following maintenance operation : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/d2s1fmjf8ss3

item.title: [RBX8][Dedicated servers-Network] - R833A05
item.description:
Oct 11, 10:35 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 11/10/2022 09:35 UTC
End Time : 11/10/2022 10:15 UTC
Service status : Some servers were unreachable. Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on the cooling system.
